Review.Titre: Needs some work but overall good product
Review.Contenu: Great service and little to no downtime and easy to implement/train users on. We have it integrated through ServiceTitan so a lot of the admin features/settings are not available to us (not sure if that is ServiceTitan or Dialpad). The integration with ServiceTitan could be better or more integrated (again not sure if that's Dialpad or ServiceTitan related or both). Reporting is very cumbersome and not user friendly. Lacks some obvious features of other contact systems especially when it comes to IVR, reporting, and Admin settings/functions. There is some work to be done to compare/compete with other contact systems, overall we are happy with Dialpad especially with it being "partially" integrated with ServiceTitan and how easy it was to implement/train/use the system for 50+ users

Review.Titre: We drop a lot of calls which is super…
Review.Contenu: We drop a lot of calls which is super frustrating in a sales & service environment. Other than that the functionality of the system is quite robust.

Review.Titre: Like it but have some issues at times
Review.Contenu: We chose dialpad so that we had a flexible phone system for the changes that were planned in the business.  The change came in combination with a Sprint business account.  We learned that Dialpad will not work with our server/cloud situation due to the software we use to connect to our server sessions.  Headsets do not work on the server sessions, we have to use the app on a desktop and open another window to access our information on the server session.  We have figured the solution on our own but find that we cannot always answer the phone when it rings without having to refresh the app - missing inbound calls..  Using Dialpad on my cell phone is not  easy.  I am lucky if I successfully answer 1 in 10 of the calls forwarded there.  Most of the time, the outbound calls are just fine and once we get into our work, we have adjusted to the way we have to use our server session and the dialpad desktop app.
Occasionally, phone calls don't come through consistently (they show up as a missed call) but other than that it's been great!

Review.Titre: Good if you only have a few users
Review.Contenu: Good if you only have a few users, but not a substitute for a real phone system.  There is no way to park calls or page other phones.
We consistently have issues with Dialpad as a company. We often have to restart and troubleshoot. It is an issue on a recurring basis.

I read on your website or somewhere at one time your motto was "Killing the desk phone" Every desk phone I have ever used, included a speaker phone option available at the touch of 1 as in SINGLE button. I suggested that feature to your company last year when. I consider it a basic phone feature you should included in version 1. Why do we have to contact you to move licenses from 1 site to another. That is just stupid and antiquated way of thinking. Your product idea is great but it needs a lot of improvement. I find your GUI complicated and kind of cumbersome. Some listed options don't even work as an average person would expect. Another good example is that the app is not keeping user settings after updating.The address book is another thing. I hate about the app. 1st it doesn't respect Call as XXX settings when calling(out) to people. 2nd One contact is duplicate 2, 3 or more times for some users.Your applications GUI, call dropping etc is why some people in our company are actually opting to keep their desk phone.

Have Had dialpad for over a year now for my small business with 3 employees. Its spotty to say the least. When it's good it's great and when its bad well... Call Quality is always amazing. My major complaint is with the Windows desktop app. when we call out it activates the headset linked to our PC, Sometimes when we call out the app will start to dial out, stop then dial out again within a 1 second period of time. this happens so quickly it triggers the headset to turn on, turn off and doesn't get the turn-on signal again. Customer service always seems like they are out on errands most of the time too or not to concerned with the issue. they have never completelypushed me aside and always came through for me however they always seem like they got better things to do. Moble app honestly has never failed me. Pretty much always realible. Very modern look which i like alot. This product is very appealing to business/ proffesionals of any trade with its look. All in all with all things considered I Would Recommend this product to anyone needing a cloud phone based system however it could use some bug fixes and attention to the desktop app.

I've been using this as the main phone & SMS tool for my small online business for the past 2 years or so. In theory, I love the concept of VOIP for my business with everything handled online, and I think I chose them also because they support integration with my Obi device that allows me to use a traditional phone/headset with a VOIP service.In practice, it's just been ok. Lots of bugs, in my opinion, and I really haven't seen much progress with them. For example, I don't get most missed call notifications from the Mac desktop app so I have to open the app to check all the time. The organization across "departments" (i.e. different call menu options) is not intuitive. Sometimes the landline doesn't ring. And now for almost a week my texting did not work and I didn't even know the first couple of days as there was no error message, so I probably just missed some business / frustrated some potential customers. And then their customer support was slow and not that helpful.I hope they get new management to really nail this product for small online businesses like ours, or otherwise I will search for a better service.

Review.Titre: Texting and use of features is great
Review.Contenu: Texting and use of features is great, but call quality is subpar. More dropped calls than completed calls.

Review.Titre: Very acceptable voice conference for the money
Review.Contenu: Very acceptable voice conference for free. Quality of screen shares needs to be enhanced.
Uber is see awesome. The only issue is that the recording does not record screen share.

Review.Titre: When you dial out it shows an out of…
Review.Contenu: When you dial out it shows an out of state  number which is annoying.

Review.Titre: It gets hang sometimes and I have to…
Review.Contenu: It gets hang sometimes and I have to delete and download it again.

Review.Titre: We have too much noise I have…
Review.Contenu: We have too much noise I have complained but no body cares to help

Review.Titre: I've been using UberConference for professional telecons with 30-40 people
Review.Contenu: I've been using UberConference for several years for a weekly professional telecon involving 30-40 people. In general, it works well. The recording option is excellent, and high quality. The phone line connections are almost always very good. That being said, a few months ago they did a big changeroo, in which control is now with a local app rather than an online web page. They did that with no warning. Just *poof!* you gotta be using this app! The new app works, but is less capable than the original implementation. One thing REALLY pisses me off. The original Uberconference used to have, in one corner of the page, an indicator of who is talking now, and who was last talking. That is now gone. The indicator of who is talking now is where the participant icon is highlighted. Now, these icons are big, and there are only eight or so on a page. So if you have a telecon with 40 people, and you want to know who is talking, you have to quickly scroll through all the icons to look for the one that is highlighted! But even worse is noise management. With forty people on the line, someone always has background talking, a barking dog, or something. You want to mute them. The indicator of who was last talking (or, interrupting, as it might be) was a great way to do this identification. That indicator is now GONE. So now, while the noisemaker is occasionally making noise, you have to quickly scroll through all the icons to see which one gets briefly highlighted when the noise is happening. This is AWFUL for noise management! I have complained about this to UC, and they say "thanks, we'll think about it!". Crapola. I'll probably be looking for a service that does things the way UC used to responsibly do it.
It's good, but sometimes too many options!

Review.Titre: Asked for a refund because I had to let…
Review.Contenu: Team was great during onboarding.Asked for a refund because I had to let my sales team go and they refused to provide it. I did end up receiving the refund but it took more effort than it should have.

Overall, great service.  But, not perfect.  Loved that you didn't need a pin to dial-in until Chinese robocalls / war dialing started back in October 2019.  Wish you could block foreign calls.  Also, managing contacts is weak.  Always typing names for each meeting for known numbers.  Lastly, can't have multiple users manage a single number.  So, you have a single point of failure for reoccurring meetings.

For the most part, Dialpad is a helpful resource! My only complaint is that if you don't have the application fully open, and a call comes through, the application doesn't open up for you. Then the notification goes away so there's no way of knowing then the caller or if the call connected (which takes a few seconds, which is fine but obviously could be better). The transcription of the call is very helpful.

We are pleased overall with how Dialpad performs in our business communications. The ability to place a phone call to technical support is great, compared to Vonage, which only has chat support for small businesses. While the mobile app for iOS has worked excellent, the app for Windows desktop has consistently given issues, not sure why.

Review.Titre: Everything generally mostly worked fine, although there are some problems not resolved.
Review.Contenu: Everything mostly worked fine, although there were audio difficulties with one person who could hear us but the rest could not. Not sure what the problem was. Another person does not want to connect by computer, having had problems connecting. We think it has something to do with his browser being Firefox, but we aren't sure.

So far, I haven't had any issues with them. Whenever I had issues, I just gave them a call, and it was resolved within minutes. However, the pricing is quite high compared to our previous provier, but with AI transcription and all those creature comforts, I can find the pricing justifiable.

PROS:- Simple enough to use platform- Good prices- Lots of simple customization- Can get hold of Customer Support easily CONS:- As per other comments, getting a helpful answer from Customer Support is difficult. They only read the same stuff I can access myself online. Also the answers differ from person to person- The definitions to certain objects is far too vague and their team cannot give you a clear answer. EG: What is 'Auto Transfer'? Is this within my control or not? No clear answer about what it is or how I can improve it.- CSM support leaves a lot to be desired. I have stopped contacting them for the past few months and mainly research myself, or call Customer Support if needed. Last resort is CSM.

I recently switched VOIP services to Dialpad. The reason to move was an easy one, everything that they lacked, Dialpad has! Fantastic UI/UX, easy to navigate, intuitive phone app, easy integrations to CRMs. Clear calls, on the Windows app, web app, desk phone and phone app.I will increase my review to 5* once they have 100% integration with Yealink. Setup was REALLY simple, too. It works great with the physical phone, but the button on the headset doesn't work to hang up or answer from the Windows app yet. (And I know they're working on this, as of Feb 23.)

Review.Titre: Great app at best price in market
Review.Contenu: Great app at best price in market! Loads of features to suit your business needs. Only issue we had faced & reported but not resolved is call volumes on Andriod phones is extreemly low, can only use on speaker. On the other hand Windows app is flawless!

Review.Titre: Overall it is a great phone program
Review.Contenu: Overall it is a great phone program, and being able to text is beyond helpful, and it's so easy to add contacts to keep track of clients. Sometimes it is a little glitchy though, and though I haven't had major problems, it isn't perfect.

Review.Titre: If you are looking for a straight…
Review.Contenu: If you are looking for a straight forward conference calling solution, for a smaller number of people, this works great!  I have not tried using it on a larger scale group, so it may work for that too.  But, it has it voice intelligence solution built in to help transcribe the call, an action items list to help to take notes while in the platform so you can focus on the call/video at the same time.

Review.Titre: Excellent tool for free conference call…
Review.Contenu: Excellent tool for free conference call management.  Our small firm has been using UberConference for about a year without problems (the only caveat is calls are limited to 45 minutes in free version).  Good control tools while on the call, screen sharing and reports.

Review.Titre: The conference line has always been…
Review.Contenu: The conference line has always been very clear and uninterrupted.One of the features that we like best is that you do not have to use pin to join the conference line.The new website looks great too.Can payment be made in Canadian currency since we live in Canada and use Canadian Dollars?

Review.Titre: Dialpad's desktop app is the best…
Review.Contenu: Dialpad's desktop app is the best aspect of Dialpad. Easy call transferring, robust settings options, and solid call connection. The mobile app and Zendesk integration are not as friendly, especially the mobile app which seems to have a really hard time connecting to calls.

Dialpad has been very helpful in contacting clients. I use it daily to connect with clients. At times it can be a little confusing to navigate but after a little practice, it has become an integral part of my work day

I use dialpad for work, It is awesome that it records calls and stores them for future. We also send all calls to a specific email. The only drawback are 1. we can only text one at a time, so when doing reminders, we cant send all at once. The other is that we cant archive anything, so if we need to followup on a call, we have to search through all calls to find, and kep a separate journal to know who to follow up on. If you have more than one person checking calls, this is hard to share everyones journal.

Dialpad has been very useful, but it's pricey! We have loved the features and how it integrates into our Salesforce solution. However, its pretty pricey and it costs our small nonprofit a good amount just to use its basic features.

Review.Titre: Less Complicated in Some, More in Others
Review.Contenu: Dialpad is genuinely a great service, specially in their customer service front. However, nothing can be perfect, and the system does have its ups and down, like only having a minimum of 4 digit extensions, only able to do blind transfers, room phones are kinda annoying to set up and use, and finally, for whatever reason, whenever i finish setting up a desk phone, I'm unable to every access the phones IP Config Utility again.While the service is great, after talking to them for various things, their support team is honestly just reading what's on the help center verbatim.Another very frustrating thing is that there is no way to directly contact the porting team. This has caused completely avoidable issues many times.

Love Dial Pad! It delivers and works well with our company, I didn't give 5 stars only because of the upcoming text message changes that don't have anything to do with how we do work.Works well, would recommend!

Review.Titre: Easy to use and record calls
Review.Contenu: I enjoy using this service because it is easy to use and record calls. The sound quality is good, and of course the price is great! The only downsides: 1) the log in experience--difficult to log in online; I have to log in by phone, and then wait to be connected to my conference line. And 2) you can't send out recordings to participants.

Works great, I've used a lot of other 'dialers' and some don't have VM capability, which is crazy to me?! This one works great, I use it in conjunction with SalesForce and I wish it had some better integrations with it.

Okay. I'm sold. While I wish there were more pro features in the standard plan. Dialpad is pretty on point with calling and AI. It's not perfect, and there's room for improvement (and the taxes were 150%), but overall, I do recommend giving them a look.

Review.Titre: Recent software changes took a while to…
Review.Contenu: Recent software changes took a while to get used to.  Conference calling works well, except when they change your phone number effective January 1, notify you on 12/31, and you have meetings already scheduled with the old number on 1/2 !!

It's excellent.Best phone service we could get for our company. The only reason I'm giving 5 stars is that the app on the mobile phone isn't great for calls, most of the time there is a delay. Other than that it's fantastic!

Review.Titre: Overall very efficient, with click-to-call and voicemail drop features
Review.Contenu: This calling software has been very helpful for my job for a call center. Compared to the previous call software that was used, the DialPad functions of click-to-call and voicemail drop have increased productivity. I like that identifying our different calling projects by name and phone number can easily be done and updated as often as needed by my supervisor. My company uses DialPad in its basic capabilities, but I can see there are options for receiving calls, receiving voicemail, call transcripts, call summaries, and more. My only feedback for improvement is that sometimes loading the software, and the connectivity for some calls, isn't as clear or as fast as I would prefer, but that also may be due to my Internet service. Overall, I'd give the software an A-.

Easily accessible for callers, decent price. I like that I can cancel anytime and not incur any extra fees. Also, like that when I need it again, the price is the same and there are no additional fees to restart service.
Love how conversations are transcribed really really helpful. I wish there was a way to add notes on a contact as well. Very useful app highly recommend

Review.Titre: I use uberconference regularly and it…
Review.Contenu: I use uberconference regularly and it works well.  I would like to be able to see why another user is having trouble with their camera or audio, otherwise I would rate as 5star.

Review.Titre: I've been using Dialpad for a couple of…
Review.Contenu: I've been using Dialpad for a couple of years now and never had any issues. Customer service is excellent and everything works very well.

The reliability and convenience and quality of Uberconferences, and the reliable recordings that come out of them, are terrific - second to none. I was impressed yesterday that when my Internet connection dropped for a few seconds, the recording continued, and I neither lost the first part of the conversation nor had to do anything to pick up the second half after the restore. The service would be perfect if I could use it to call out to interviewees, rather than force them to call me. But I'm sure you hear that a lot, and in all other ways count me as a big fan.

Review.Titre: Small Business Software moving towards Enterprise
Review.Contenu: Dialpad is one of the best soft-phone/VoIP systems out there and the first one we started using around 2016 after upgrading from our analog system. We still find value utilizing this system, even at the steep-ish price we pay yearly. I'm glad of the route we went, if we ever go to self hosted or have or own PBX, we'll know what kind of features we want versus what we need.The features we use are great like group calling / ringing groups (departments), auto recording for said departments, call transferring (hard transfer only), auto attendant, open/closed hours, hold music, set holidays and more. The integrations are great as well, especially the HubSpot integration so that the team sees that call historical data of a contact so that we are on the same page. The analytic reports are nice so you can see trends (I can see when we typically see more or less calls depending on the day, month, year and now compare years). There isn't much to complain about except for the price. Maybe if they had a self hosted option that would be cool at a lower rate. Something to where the company has more control over it's data. Also their voice transcription sucks, it's funny to read them sometimes because they are so off. Overall it's probably the best soft-phone SaaS out there, but make sure to explore the options.
I got what I needed.

I like them. The ease of calling and messaging is fantastic. I do wish it was a bit better about showing up as scam to some people, but I imagine there isn't anything to do about that. I do like the way you can send a message to the IT people easily if needed.

Uber Conference is very convenient to use for group conference calls. The ability to schedule them ahead of time and have the app send out reminders with the call-in info is very convenient for the host. The clarity of the calls is great, as well as the hosts ability to control the call features such as recording or muting. My one complaint is that when participating in a conference call via the app, I have had my phone’s screen auto-lock, which then mutes me and makes me unable to hear the other participants and the only fix I have found of force-closing the app and rejoining the call.
Dialpad is user friendly. It works as expected and callers are not given a prompt of what service you are using, like other apps do.

Love this and works perfectly for all my business phone needs. The only issue that I have is that everytime I open it up I get hints on the account, searching and inbox and I can not figure out how to get it to go away. Other than that, very happy.

Review.Titre: Dialpad is an excellent VOIP provider…
Review.Contenu: Dialpad is an excellent VOIP provider and it has improved our sales operation's efficiency and productivity. Onboarding was relatively simple and the interface is logical and easy to use for staff of all proficiencies. The mobile app is excellent and works perfectly alongside the Windows app. The only negative points for us were issues with billing in the first 6 months, related to the custom package which we were sold and Dialpad's initial inability to bill correctly, and the imperfect Salesforce CTI which still has some limitations which our team have to work around. Overall I would not hesitate to recommend Dialpad.
Overall, very reliable service and it gets the job done, would like more features and easier UI, phone app some time has delay before I can hear the other end, transcript feature is amazing.
This is a great conferencing tool that allows for the recording and the transcript to go out immediately following the call. The only thing that would make it better is if it was free.
Love that you can use the application or even on the internet browser if needed.  Use it for my primary internal communication.
Its a nice platform but logging in/getting prospects in can be inconvenient. Also, platforms like Google Hangouts are free and offer very similar experiences.

Dialpad is handy and easy to access/operate especially for the remote first company that I work for. I specifically like the feature that transcripts voicemails without listening to the actual voicemail, which comes in handy when receiving a call during a virtual meeting. I also enjoy the feature when transferring a call, you have a variety of options that include transferring the call immediately or contacting the recipient first to see if they are available.

Review.Titre: Having Dial Pad has been an asset in…
Review.Contenu: Having Dial Pad has been an asset in our office.  Our clients love that they can text us as well as call our office.

Review.Titre: Sometimes the sound quality is not…
Review.Contenu: Sometimes the sound quality is not always good. Mostly it is fine!It is reliable but very occasionally the call can drop off.

Review.Titre: I love the concept and the service this…
Review.Contenu: I love the concept and the service this offers. I would give it 5 stars except the settings are not clear or easy to navigate. I think it could use some wording changes.

Review.Titre: We are new to Dialpad and have really…
Review.Contenu: We are new to Dialpad and have really enjoyed it so far! It allows for easy transfers between team members and the guides are so easy to follow!
Recording quality is pretty good. Easy to use, don't get dropout. Automated transcripts are pretty useless.
Very versatile and you can see who's on the call and even record the call to send out to those who couldn't attend.
Some connection challenges from time to time, but pretty rare and generally a very easy program to use.
DialPad is great for calling internationally. I think it's a solid product and my preferred calling app.
I think it's really great!  Sometimes connectivity and delays can happen, but the user interface is great!

Review.Titre: I love the integration with other…
Review.Contenu: I love the integration with other platforms. Very user friendly.
The core software is terrific. Admin and Meetings can use some improvement.
We  really like UberConference. They have met a great need in our ministry.
My employer just provided us with Dialpad and it seems very easy to use.

Review.Titre: Oliver was helpful and quick to respond
Most of the time it was great
Review.Contenu: Most of the time it was great, except for a couple of calls where the quality was not that good.
to date we have been quite satisfied with the platform!
Pretty good so far, just wish it was cheaper since we only use it maybe twice per month.
Have had a great experience using dialpad, has some pretty neat features that make documenting information during calls easy.

Review.Titre: some reliability issues comes and go
Review.Contenu: some reliability issues comes and go, especially with sharing screen, and sometimes with selection of bluetooth mic and speaker
DialPad has been helpful in managing calls, voicemails, and tracking. Definitely recommend!

Review.Titre: The new interface takes some getting…
Review.Contenu: The new interface takes some getting used to.
Good quality sound. Very good customer service.

Review.Titre: It is great that I can get calls from…
Review.Contenu: It is great that I can get calls from my computer....Dial pad is very easy to use.

Review.Titre: You cant really tell if when the number…
Review.Contenu: You cant really tell if when the number will be marked as spam or scam likely so for a person who frequently uses Dialpad. It's hard to reach out frequently to the Customer Team to get it changed. But, they do have an easy interface to work with, it's easy to text or call people!
Great quality call & service. Thank you!

This is a great way to have anyone you are calling or trying to get a hold of without actually using your personal phone number. But, the only reason I gave yall a 4 star is because this number comes  up as a Spam Number to most of my customers, and they will not pick up the phone. And I can not text most because they still have land lines not cell numbers.

There are a few annoying things that affect the user experience. That said, the service/product as a whole is great. It replaces a very cumbersome experience with one that is much better. My work phone is now anywhere that my computer/mobile is. Would like it if the handoff between mobile and PC were better. Example: if I have the phone app open and on my PC, when a call rings to my PC, I'm locked out of answering it on the mobile app.

Review.Titre: I use the service as a loan originator
Review.Contenu: I use the service as a loan originator. I don't have any other software to compare it to, but it has come in handy when I need to make reference to a past conversation. I haven't decided whether I like certain aspects yet, but for the most part, it does what it is supposed to do. It probably translates 80-90% of my conversations accurately.

I really like Dialpad. I like the option to text or call and the call quality is usually good. The main issues I’ve had is occasional issues with connection while making a call and I would like to have the option to do a video/FaceTime call.I do think the user interface could be better through the app where some steps using the app for calls or texts is a bit clunky, but overall Dialpad has been very helpful.

It's a great way to connect with customers from your laptop/desktop without having to use any additional equipment, such as desk phone or mobile phone. You can also download the app on your mobile phone and take it with you everywhere. It's a great communication tool. I love that I can also text my customers if they're not responding to my call due to the unrecognized telephone number.

Overall, it is a great and affordable way to hold conference calls and screen sharing with a group.  The interface for the meeting is easy to use and makes it easy to mute others who forget they are on a call while doing something else!Only downside I have seen is I, and others, occasionally get kicked out of the meeting or their audio disappears.  Can fix but rejoining but it breaks the momentum of the meeting.

Overall, Dialpad has been an amazing tool for us to communicate with our clients. There was just a time when we experienced delays of messages in our group chat. It was quite hard to catch up with urgent informations because it wasn't visible in one of our staff's account.

Review.Titre: No Complaints. Service just works and works well.
Review.Contenu: Quite reliable. Overall does a great job for local/international calls. Only complaint is the ios/android app could be a bit more optimized as there are still some bus that need to be worked out. Texting feature which includes images is awesome and works perfect as well. Customer support and overall call quality/reliability has been great though. No complaints.

Review.Titre: Dialpad has solved a lot of problems for us!
Review.Contenu: Dialpad has solved a lot of problems for us. We used to have a pretty usual office phone system, which is to say that it was cumbersome, difficult to use, and had a needless reliance on vendors for administration. Dialpad puts all of the settings I need right in my hands, at a lower price, and allowed us to "take the phones with us" wherever we go!

Review.Titre: This is honestly one of the best…
Review.Contenu: This is honestly one of the best softphones I've ever used.  It's intuitive, and simply works most of the time.  My only gripe is there isn't a way to program pauses into dial strings (a feature request I've made numerous times), so I can dial into regular conference calls with one click.  That's why I give it four out of five stars.

Simple reliable service. The dialpad platform is easy to use and keep track of calls missed or voicemails. The transcript of voicemails may need a little update to be more accurate otherwise all the features are effective to use. My phone runs entirely though dialpad on my laptop and my headset which is connected via USB/Bluetooth.

Review.Titre: I enjoy the ease of using Uber…
Review.Contenu: I enjoy the ease of using Uber conference. I prefer using the paid monthly/business option because no pin is required and the time is unlimited. I also enjoy using the app as well as having the option to host a conference from my laptop. I have also used the free conference option. It isn't bad, but the 45mins given is short 1 hour would be good. Overall, clear sounding and easy to use!

Review.Titre: I've relied on UberConference for over…
Review.Contenu: I've relied on UberConference for over 3 years now and continue to use it.  I don't think I've ever had a call dropped and the connection is usually excellent.  My one star off is because sometimes people have a problem with the PIN not working.  Either I have a lot of PIN-challenged colleagues or there is something to their issue.  Still the best deal around!

Our company has really enjoyed using Dialpad. It has streamlines a lot of our phone business and made it easy to create call centers, add new users, and transfer between a headset and mobile phone. The constant updates are a little annoying and the call quality isn't great all the time but overall we have loved Dialpad.

Dialpad is great when everything works. There are times when calls drop but I usually refresh the page and call back and that works fine. I appreciate how it integrates with Salesforce so I don't have to make my notes twice but on some contacts, it doesn't work and I don't know why. Overall, Dialpad is great when it works.

UberConference is a great resource, especially working as a consultant working with different organizations that have different technologies. Is it perfect? No, but no service really is. I love the ability to do an easy screen share as well as be able to record meetings and share them. Sometimes there is quite a lag, but it has gotten better in recent months. I would recommend UberConfernece for those looking for an easy application for meetings.

Review.Titre: I had a great experience using this…
Review.Contenu: I had a great experience using this product. The Web and Mobile app are very easy to use. The layout is nice and is great at recognizing who is speaking very quickly. The Transcript feature is neat and allows you to check back in case you missed something.Connection to the internet to use the app has to be really stable though.

Review.Titre: Simple to set up and great customer support
Review.Contenu: I like the simplicity of Dialpad and all the features. I have the desktop app and the Chrome plug in and sometimes they don't sync seamlessly. I had some trouble setting up my phone line but the support team was incredibly helpful and was able to get that working for me once again. Now I can't imagine doing my work without it!

We enjoy and value the ability to use UberConference for our remote multi-person discussions. The call quality is generally good and very clear, and the recording feature is awesome!  We sometimes have problems with the screen share being dropped, but that could be a problem with the quality of our internet connection - not sure.

Review.Titre: Great Alternative to seperate mobile device
Review.Contenu: Dialpad is a good alternatice for have an additional device. My work provides the service and I like being able to toggle back and forth between the 2 numbers. Still a little slow sometime, especially the syncing between the computer and the app on the mobile device, but were not using quantum computing yet!

Our experience with Dialpad has been pretty pleasant. As with any product there have been a few hiccups along the way but Dialpad has proved to be a great fit for our mobile-environment. We stay very busy and the application is efficient and helpful to our workflows!

Review.Titre: Uber Conference has been a great…
Review.Contenu: Uber Conference has been a great platform to host my weekly team meeting calls. It is easy to use. I like that people can log on via the phone or computer. I like that I get my own local number for my conferences. The only thing keeping me from giving it a 5 star rating is the reminder feature is 5 minutes before the call is to happen. I wish there was a feature where I could set up a reminder to all my participants at a varying intervals. Maybe 12 hours before and also maybe an hour befoe.

Review.Titre: The service is great for the…
Review.Contenu: The service is great for the organization, recording, and keeping of contacts, phone calls, and phone logs. Great analytics for tracking inflow and productivity. Had prior stability issues but have not experienced them for about a month now. Their support technicians are quick to respond to any issues, too.

The platform has amazing potential. The hardest thing to deal with overall is dropped calls. This is not always an issue but when it is an issue it usually is brutal. The program also has a speech to text beta program that is absolutely amazing if it works out. Overall experience is a good one!!!

Easy to use and allows multiple staff to share one department. The voicemail transcripts being sent to emails needs more improvement but being able to listen to the voicemail with just one click is a good thing. Been using it for more than a year and no major complaints so far.

Sometimes the app crashes and if I switch from using 2 monitors to 1 it doesn't migrate back to the home screen. It also doesn't enable me to have group texts. Aside from these issues, it offers lots of functionalities that are more user-friendly than Google Voice's product.

Review.Titre: Great free app for phone meetings and screen sharing
Review.Contenu: Great free app for phone meetings. The best aspect is the ability to share your screen. Be aware if you schedule the meeting through the app with a specific meeting length, the software will cut everyone off when the meeting is over—no running long! Hmmm...maybe that’s a good thing.

Love this service.  Didn't give it 5 stars only because the dashboard could be more user friendly and there is no option to manually update contacts.  They must sync with your Google account which can take a while.  Must play around with interface to figure out how to find things.

Review.Titre: Fine service, wish call quality were more reliable, but features make up for it.
Review.Contenu: Great customer service - they are missing some features I think should be standard - such as integration with my phone's phone book in the way that say Sideline works, where it calls straight to my phone line and I can see that it is a sideline call.  It's either that or their voip is less reliable over my data than is Sideline.  Of course Dialpad has some crazy features that nobody else seems to have, so I keep them for that reason (auto-AI-transcription, for example, and a dead simple and attractive GUI).Generally I'm pleased.

I needed support with a port request from a different carrier which was giving me errors. I reached out when the required additional information I had gotten from the previous provider was rejected on Dialpad. The issue was somewhat complicated to resolve, and I wasn't able to enter the correct information on my own. It took quite a while, I imagine due to complexity with the communication between providers. I wish this was able to be resolved more easily and quickly, since it ended up taking several weeks to port the numbers.Miguel stayed on my support ticket the whole way through. He was extraordinarily helpful and ultimately made sure the issue was resolved 100%. Thank you Miguel!

Overall Uberconference has been great.  There were a few situations early on (a few years ago when we first signed up), where the call quality was bad, we had annoying noise in the background, etc.  But I can honestly say the past couple of years have been fine.

Review.Titre: This is our fifth VoIP phone system
Review.Contenu: This is our fifth VoIP phone system, and the best we've had so far. We can dial out from a central number, and voicemails are shared among the team. There's text messages, and call routing on even the basic plan. Call Quality is very good, at least here in Colorado. That said, the dialer app could be more intuitive. There are a lot of settings and options on the user end, and it's not always clear what they do. We get odd empty 5 second voicemails from time to time, and the actual implementation of text messaging could be improved considerably, as it feels like it was just jammed in there as an afterthought.

Anthony is very helpful. Went above and beyond to assist. He could have just answered my question but he did more than that. He assisted me and showed me what I was needing 2 months ago when we signed up.

RR was Great! While my issues weren't resolved during the chat, it was out of his control. He kept me updated during the entire process and will be sending me updates as other teams get the issues worked out.

Roger was awesome. Very patient, clear and helped me with my exact needs. he even suggested i reach out to the sales team and request a trial for the Pro plan because that plan was specific to my business. I did exactly that. Cheers

Review.Titre: Dialpad Meetings - The Communications Service I have had
Review.Contenu: I have had Dialpad Meetings as a service provider for way over 10 years.  The service itself has always been exceptional, and Dialpad continues to upgrade its service without upping its fees.  I am always able to get timely, competent, efficient, personal and friendly support with a direct call through a number clearly displayed on the Contact Us page.  This morning's encounter with my support rep, Eric, just reminded me of what a great service Dialpad Meeting is.
Martin was extremely patient with me even though I was very hard to deal with.  He did not give up until he found a resolution to my issues.

Review.Titre: Very good tool. Exceptional experience when asking for support.
Review.Contenu: The tool is very robust and helps me track my team performance quite nicely. But this review is for their online support team. I had an issue when trying to add a user to my sales center. I had to open a ticket on their online support center. Within a couple of minutes Jessica C was in touch with me via email. After a couple of mails she solved the problem. For my previous experience using the tool, and this great support experience I'm giving Dialpad a 5 star review.

Review.Titre: Easy to use system and very efficient
Review.Contenu: Easy to use system and very efficient, customer service is very helpful as well.

Review.Titre: The Agent I worked with was very helpful. Thanks Clarice!
Review.Contenu: The Agent I worked with, Clarice, was super patient with helping me TS an issues I couldn't figure out with a new user we added to our account. She helped me isolate and resolve the issue quickly and gave next steps incase it happened again.
I spoke with Mc, and he gave me a very straight to the point answer, giving me information with whom i should speak with to resolve my issue. Sadly speaking with Denmark didn't lead me anywhere.

Review.Titre: Thanks to Charlene for great service
Review.Contenu: So impressed with Dialpad so far. Charlene was just such a pleasure to deal with - always available, responsive to calls and emails, and incredibly patient at navigating 5 people through the set up process. The whole customer experience was heads above any other provider I've tried. Instead of getting bounced around to someone new each time, you get one person assigned to you, who really understands the problems you're trying to solve. Also, no slick sales people offering you the world and then you find when it comes to induction that they don't offer that thing you wanted after all. Everything they said the app could do, the app could do. Thanks so much Charlene for all your help - hugely appreciated.

Review.Titre: I had a great experience with Garcia
Review.Contenu: I had a great experience with Garcia - Dialpad Support teamEverything is so smooth with her helpSwift action and kind support.
KUDOS TO JOHN. He has been so patient and helped us out all the way, fixed our SMS issue which was lingering on for months. We are grateful for the excellent customer support from Dialpad.

Review.Titre: Reaching someone LIVE on tech support : )
Review.Contenu: I'm so lucky that I was connected with Rey from Tech Support who was able to help me with everything I needed.  When I explained what I wanted to accomplish, he explained that I needed to purchase 2 "AI" lines to replace the 2 "additional" lines that I had purchased.  As I purchased the 2 "AI" lines, he put in the request to credit my account for 2 "additional" lines mistaken purchase.  Then Rey helped me obtain 4 sequential phone numbers for my company.  This is a service that only tech support can provide -- it isn't listed in the HELP section.  Rey made the process fast and easy.  Rey is a knowledgeable and customer-focused tech support rep.  The problem/solution situation I described is a shining example of why it's so important to allow customers to have direct access to tech support is vitally important.  (NOTE: I had to call the sales office in order to get connected to tech support.  Prior to this, I had carefully read all info pertaining to my set up needs and no where did it explain the difference between purchasing another "AI" line vs. an additional line.  It's really a shame that I had to waste so much time watching the DialPad set up youtube and re-reading the HELP section which didn't address my needs.  But having that live conversation with Rey in Tech Support solved everything.)

Review.Titre: Dialpad's Ryan McCarthy - One in a million
Review.Contenu: Dialpad is a great company, with excellent apps, admin platform and all the latest bells and whistles you could imagine. The best part though, is their people. Especially our account manager - Ryan McCarthy. If all the people in this world would take their work to heart the way he does - we would all live in a better place. I cannot describe how thrilled we are to have him on our side. Thank you, Ryan, for the stellar work and for the commitment to your client that makes many other competitors look real bad :)

Review.Titre: Andren Rey Bungubung went above and…
Review.Contenu: Andren Rey Bungubung went above and beyond to help me today. I was frustrated and emotional and he stayed calm, positive, and reassuring. He was kind and thoughtful and went out of his way to make sure I got the help I needed. Andren is an example of what excellent customer service looks like. I was ready to cancel my DialPad account, and because of Andren, I will continue to be a loyal customer. You have a wonderful rep and I hope you know how lucky you are to have him representing the company. Thank you Andren!

Dialpad's customer service is unmatched. I've dealt with their team about 7 times for support, upgrading numbers and general questions and every time I was on the phone instantly and off in less than 5 minutes. Compared to any other provider, Dialpad's support is truly the best. Highly recommend for small businesses! Thanks to Karen U and the team at Dialpad for making our lives so much easier.
Even though my inquiry wasn't resolved during the initial contact, Christian helped escalate it to help me get it done.  Much appreciated!

When looking into Dialpad I've been dealing with consultants between Australia and overseas for weeks, unfortunately I've received mixed info contradicting each other, or no answers to my questions until yesterday.  Thank you to ELRoy Bragado for his patience and outstanding customer service.  He's given me peace of mind to finally use Dialpad as of yesterday.  So far so good and I'm sure I'll have more questions for in the future, but for now I've got more confidence in moving forward with Dialpad thanks to ELRoy.

Review.Titre: Mike Garcia is the best Customer Service Specialist
Review.Contenu: Mike's patience in understanding my problem was truly commendable. His approach made it remarkably easy for him to swiftly resolve not one, but two issues that had been plaguing me for days. Mike, I want to extend my sincere gratitude to you! Please continue your outstanding work.

Review.Titre: Marlon was extremely patient, polite and very professional
Review.Contenu: Marlon was extremely patient, polite, very professional and very knowledgeable.  He figured out the problem and delivered the solution!  Thank you Marlon and Dialpad!  What a relief that he was available this evening to help me get these two accounts opened and ready to go in the morning!  GREAT JOB!

Review.Titre: Greatly appreciate the help we were given!
Review.Contenu: Greatly appreciate the help we were given. Ultimately we were not able to get our issue fixed, but our agent, RR, got tons of info from us to send to the next level of support for us to get this figured out one way or another. Super polite and willing to help!

I finally received the information after numerous requests on updating the department from the main line and replacing each of them with a Contact Center. No one else at DialPad expressed this to me in the other emails or calls. This was a frustrating situation that should have been much easier.

He has an incredible grasp of the product. I made an initial call this morning, but I must admit I got a bit frustrated with the first tech support agent I spoke with. Luckily, I decided to call again, and that's when I had the pleasure of speaking with Josh.He not only resolved my issue but explained it to me as if I were in grade 1. I really appreciate that because I'm not the most tech-savvy person, and his patience and understandable approach made all the difference.Josh is undoubtedly an invaluable asset to your company. I strongly recommend that you not only keep him but also give him the credit he truly deserves! 👏👍

Andren Bungubung, was an awesome Tech support for our org. A sense of urgency is always needed being a homeless shelter. Personal Diagnostics via email was provided; I almost solved my issue myself but having over the phone aid solved my problem. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Ray was fantastic and helped me with my…
Review.Contenu: Ray was fantastic and helped me with my issue with Dialpad.  He worked hard to get me a solution. I was very pleased with Ray. I worked with another tech support person prior to him who just read a script and could not help me and refused to transfer me to someone else.  Ray was fantastic though and I cannot thank him enough for his help.

my experience was amazing, i had problems sending SMS and didn't know how to fix it and the agent Jansin walked me thru everything and explained it step by step to me. We solved the problem, and everything is good now, this kind of help is really hard to come by, so I highly appreciate him helping me thru it.
Didn’t have to wait on hold, love talking to a live agent. He was super knowledgeable and assisted me a great deal!

Although I was initially put off by the fact that support was being handled through WhatsApp, the whole process was fast and much better than expected.  And, perhaps most important,  the support person, Joey, was knowledgeable and helpful!

JOSH DESERVES A MILLION CLAPS AND PAT ON A BACK FOR BEING PATIENT AND UNDERSTANDING WITH ME, HE SHOULD BE A ROLE MODEL TO THE COMPANY, MAKE HIM AN AMBASSADOR EVEN!!! NOTHING BEATS HOW SPLENDID HE IS AT HELPING PEOPLE AND ORGANIZED HE IS! THANK YOU JOSH, MAY YOU BE BLESSED EVERYDAY! YOU HAVE AN AWESOME DAY FIT FOR AN AWESOME YOU! DON'T FORGET TO SMILE ALWAYS :D

Karen U was great at answering my questions and resolving then quickly. I have over 20 years in sales and customer service and I must say she is an asset to your business.  Great work Karen! Thank you for your help.

Review.Titre: Been using dialpad for almost 3 years…
Review.Contenu: Been using dialpad for almost 3 years now.Cant be more happier.

Review.Titre: Very powerful system for AI assisted Call Center operations
Review.Contenu: Very powerful system for AI assisted Call Center applications. Lots of options. Any time I have configuration questions or issues that are not covered in the extensive cascade driven Help section, I reach out to live chat. The wait times for agents at all reasonable waking hours for PDT TZ have been short and every agent that has helped me resolve an issue has been knowledgeable, courteous and professional. Great product, excellent Customer Support.

Super supportive onboarding and support team.William Sandbach answered all of my (many) questions and made sure that I got the best start with Dialpad.Although the platform looks perfect for my needs, his support is a big reason as to why I'll be moving from a trial to a paid plan.

We came from an old-fashioned in-house PBX system and considered a number of vendors before trying Dialpad. Support is excellent and very thorough and fast. Documentation is ridiculously extensive, yet well laid-out and clear. Call quality is excellent and the built-in auto-attendant, transcription, follow-me, desktop and phone apps are all stable and excellent. No down-time or network problems. The cost per-seat is competitive and it works well. We're a small user, but that doesn't seem to make a difference since the customer services is first-rate. And, it just works. What more could you want?
Excellent service, very happy with the way Jun explained everything and resolved our issue.

Review.Titre: Scalable product with killer real-time transcription
Review.Contenu: Dialpad is such a great product from my experience so far. I'm running a small business. Initially just myself but now expanding to a second department. I love how economical it is for my purpose, and yet how scalable it seems to be for when the business expands. IMO the killer piece of functionality is the transcription of every call. So great to have a record I can go back to, and saves me taking copious notes. Even better is that it does this in real-time, so if the line is not perfect or if I switch focus for a second, I can still see what the other person said.

Mr. Marlon was fabulous! Patient, professional, and knew exactly how to walk me through my issue efficiently and with expertise and kindness.Please add this review to Mr Marlon's employee file.Dr. Patricia A Eckardt 09/07/2023 115pm EST
Jansin is very helpful. The willingness to help is outstanding. Explains very well. I hope that he gets a promotion or a raise atleast. Overall, very satisfied.

Review.Titre: Had a question that was not easily…
Review.Contenu: Had a question that was not easily answered (a bit outside the box) and received quite a bit of help including drawing on additional resources within the team.Not 100% handled quite yet but they switched the conversation over to email so I didn't have to hang on. Very very professional and I'm very very happy about the help received

Sarah was responsive, polite, and able to identify my needs quickly and bring resolution to my requests!  The interaction as a whole was wonderful as was her follow up when I got disconnected out of the chat to ensure everything had been accomplished!  Thank you, Sarah!

Review.Titre: I can't ask for a better phone service
Review.Contenu: I can't ask for a better phone service. Every time, I need help someone is there, as patient as can be because the answer could be right under my nose after a long day.Communication is clear and precise and I have no problems following along.Thank you DialPad Team!!!

Jansin was fantastic - one of the best calls with a customer support agent I've ever had. Answered all my questions, hopped on a video call to walk me through my Dialpad interface - anyone else who gets support from him is lucky!!!

Review.Titre: Kudos to Krizia! Love her work. This issue and request has been over a…
Review.Contenu: This issue and request has been over a month ago and Krizia has been very helpful kind and very much willing to help. If only I can get her promoted to her job, i would love to but this survey and feedback is the least I can do to help her out. She helped the whole company/business and me in every possible way. I hope you keep her as she’s definitely an asset of your company. Kudos and Great Job Krizia..

I've only signed up for a trial at this stage but needed helpdesk support 3 times. Each time support (in particular Krizia) was fast, friendly and effective. It bodes well if this is what their support is like all of the time.

I have been working with Mr. Garcia on my Dialpad service and other than one other technical service representative. His answers have been spot on and corrected my issues first time. Mr. Garcia is the cats pajamas with his technical expertise. Thank you again.

RR was extremely patient, informative, and answered all my questions.  I had more technical questions related to new service and he took all the time needed to ensure every question I had was resolved.
Rey made it easy to sort out my issue regarding getting the text service to work.

Dialpad is a really great communication product that can help teams improve productivity and achieve their business goals! It is great for small global teams but also has enough features to run multiple  large call centers. Their sales and technical support ranks among the best of the best!

I was helped by Karen P. and she was beyond fantastic. I had previously chatted with a rep online & we just went round in circles, so I called the support phone number & was lucky to get Karen P. She was so nice, understood my issues and was able to answer all my questions fully and quickly. She made sure that ALL of my concerns were addressed & that I understood everything. Thanks to her I was able to get everything set up and optimized in less than 30 minutes - despite all my questions and requests. She was absolutely wonderful and EXACTLY what a good customer service agent should be. So thankful for her time & help today.

From sales to tech support I got a very nice experience talking to customer care. The tech support who assisted me have enough knowledge and expertise about the software. The sales explained to me a lot how the service works and it's features. Overall, kudos to the people that I talked to dialpad. You guys deserves a raised!
Andren is very knowledgable. He knows what he is doing. As soon as I explained the problem to him, he immediately pointed out what the root cause was. I am very happy with this kind of support.

Review.Titre: Sarah is different from the 2 reps that…
Review.Contenu: Sarah is different from the 2 reps that I talked to the other day.  She was very patient, helpful and knowledgeable.  She had answers to all my questions and I really appreciate how helpful she was.

Review.Titre: Showed me how to resolve my issue wihtout calling support.
Review.Contenu: Called to have a number moved from a former employee to the new employee. in the past when we removed a user we had to wait 72 hours for the number to go back to the pool or contact dial pad to fix. He showed me how to fix the reason for my call on my own, which was not possible in the past but dialpad listened to feedback and make it possible for my to self service our account.      Couldn't be happier!!!

Had technical issues. Also being very technology iliterate. I was so happy Jeff was my support agent and was very helpful I hope he sees this as he needs a pat on the back. Review.Titre: Customer service rep righted their mistake and saved the day!am a new customer with Dial Pad and…
Review.Contenu: I am a new customer with Dial Pad and became very upset when some vanity numbers I had picked and knew were available, were lost because of time delays with Dial Pad.  I had spent an entire week checking with all of the phone number sources before finally arriving at a few exciting numbers that would be important to our marketing and image.  I was given a number of status names such as: cooling, reserved, available.  These names meant nothing.  I responded with questions as to what these meant relative to the numbers I wanted.  The response was that they were now unavailable...they could not hold for very long.  I was furious.  These were numbers I would never be able to get again.  I was able to reach Marie de La Pena in support.  She was patient and listened carefully.  She took action, pressed the issue to the appropriate departments, and got the same numbers that I was told were no longer available.   How she did this I do not know.  But she saved the day.  I want to thank her from the bottom of my heart.  She is a credit to her company, especially in present times where service means little.   We were thinking very seriously of canceling our business with Dial Pad because of this ineptitude. Now we plan to stay.  Thank you again Marie.
Great support when needed! I was also calling outside of normal business hours so nice to be able to get a live person!
Dialpad has been a great resource to help us run our business and it comes with a ton of useful features! I would definitely recommend!

We highly recommend Emily and Dialpad to any organization seeking a reliable and customer-centric communications solution. Thank you, Emily, for your excellent support and for being a key reason behind our choice of Dialpad.
